data.name: Gotham City Impostors Free to Play: Ultimate Impostor Kit
data.detailed_description:
Gain immediate access to these customization options! Impostor Bundles are a great way to accelerate your customization options! Additionally, purchased Loadout items will not become re-locked if you choose to accept a Promotion as you level up!

  • Starter Impostor Kit
  • Pro Impostor Kit
  • All Weapon Packs
  • All Support Item Packs
  • All Gadget Packs
  • All Costume Packs
  • All Mascots
  • All Calling Card Packs
  • XP Boost - Team

data.supported_languages:

*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum
  • OS: Windows XP SP3
  • Processor: Dual Core CPU 2.5 GHz
  • Memory: 1.5 GB RAM
  • Hard Disk Space: 7 GB Hard Drive Space
  • Video Card: 256MB dedicated memory DX9 Video Card (GeForce 8600 or ATI X1800 or better)
  • DirectX®: DX9
  • Sound: DX9 compatible Sound Controller
  • Additional: Broadband Internet Connection
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Quad Core CPU 2 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Hard Disk Space: 7 GB Hard Drive Space
  • Video Card: 512MB DX9 High-Performance Video Card (GeForce 8800 or ATI X1900 or better)
  • DirectX®: DX9
  • Sound: DX9 compatible Sound Controller
  • Additional: Broadband Internet Connection
